import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignIn=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSignIn=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');// Mock sign-in logic

navigate('/user-profile');}else{// Handle sign-in error

",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",children:"SignUp"}),"."]})]})})})})})});};export default SignIn;
